title: Project Risk Estimation
description: The problem is to estimate the risk level of a project based on the project funding and the technical experience of the project’s team members.
rules:
# Enter the rules in this format:
# IN_variable set operator IN_variable set => OUT_variable set

# Assignment
proj_funding high or exp_level expert => risk low
proj_funding medium and exp_level intermediate => risk normal
proj_funding medium and exp_level beginner => risk normal
proj_funding low and exp_level beginner => risk high
proj_funding very_low and_not exp_level expert => risk high

# Lab
dirt small and softness soft => wash_time very_small
dirt medium and softness ordinary => wash_time standard
dirt small and_not softness soft => wash_time small
dirt medium and softness soft => wash_time small
dirt medium and softness stiff => wash_time very_large
dirt large and softness soft => wash_time standard
